channel.title: Sapphire | Zombie Survival | Game Modes | Achievements | Hiscores
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/dlbu46tbz/cooltext186343010970328.png[/img]
[SIZE=6][B]Welcome to Sapphire. May you [font=Verdana]survive[/font] to the end.[/B][/SIZE]
[url=http://sapphires.ddns.net/sapphire.jar]Sapphire Client[/url] [url=http://sapphires.ddns.net/sapphire.jar]Sapphire Client[/url] [url=http://sapphires.ddns.net/]Forums[/url]
[IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/xjjowjmwf/logo1.png[/img] [B][I]At sapphire we only wish to keep the zombie survival theme alive, as there has not been a good zombie survival since RuneZ, and since runify got shutdown very quickly we decided to keep it alive. Some may flame and say there are no updates but in fact if you download the leaked sourced that roy claims lean posted, there are in fact many bugs/glitches found and fixed so far. We hope that you will see this and come take a look for yourself as there is more to come in this world filled with pkers and zombies![/I][/B]
[IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/3nst13ulr/logo2.png[/img] [I][B] Never seen before concept wich is fun and challenging New forums layout Auto donation Auto vote system Updates weekly/daily New point systems (pkp/minigames) Unique strategic bosses More item containers Bank slots Bank tabs Achievements Boss kill log Custom pets Trivia Killstreaks Mystery well 20+ bosses (with 07 bosses) Wilderness bosses Boss instancing Full barrows Godwars Balanced combat Account modes Custom npc drops Automatic voting Good following (combat/non combat) No dupes Friendly community[/B][/I]
[IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/sv3p1cxpr/logo4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fdG3U75.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/2J6RjkD.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kqqOT9d.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/hCfB47h.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/egkxANp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eh5I1Cj.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/49qPRmn.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HLfh10w.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/eIH7GjX.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/buz46Dg.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/g8RMw5P.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/quE6Phx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/PXRr6wQ.png[/img] [IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/70sqbjusv/image.png[/img] [IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/nm5eobs8f/image.png[/img] [IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/mmf3smd2n/image.png[/img] [IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/l63laha5r/image.png[/img] [IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/89lnuat2n/image.png[/img]
[IMG]http://s33.postimg.org/h79n6t8kv/logo3.png[/img]
[B][I]Reworked Combat Reworked Pvm Drops / Caskets Fixed and tweaked alot of codes Warning sign when dropping GP since it dissapears Combat timer. Items that teleports you too different bosses. Gwd, Barrows, KQ, Corporal Beast venanetis, a wider range of pvming in general with sorted drops. Prayer fixed Special bar fixed Base Fishing / Herblore added. Restore pray/health glitch patched (this would result in negative donor points and players could always get pray/health) Changed stores accordingly. Trivia
- More to come.[/I][/B]
[spoiler=Credits:] Credits to roy and his team. [/spoiler] [/CENTER]

item.title: Sapphire | Zombie Survival | Game Modes | Achievements | Hiscores
item.dc:creator: @darkburakay darkburakay
item.description:
@darkburakay wrote:

[CENTER]

[SIZE=6]Welcome to Sapphire. May you [font=Verdana]survive[/font] to the end.[/SIZE]

Sapphire Client
Sapphire Client
Forums


At sapphire we only wish to keep the zombie survival theme alive, as there has not been a good zombie survival since RuneZ, and since runify got shutdown very quickly we decided to keep it alive. Some may flame and say there are no updates but in fact if you download the leaked sourced that roy claims lean posted, there are in fact many bugs/glitches found and fixed so far. We hope that you will see this and come take a look for yourself as there is more to come in this world filled with pkers and zombies!



Never seen before concept wich is fun and challenging
New forums layout
Auto donation
Auto vote system
Updates weekly/daily
New point systems (pkp/minigames)
Unique strategic bosses
More item containers
Bank slots
Bank tabs
Achievements
Boss kill log
Custom pets
Trivia
Killstreaks
Mystery well
20+ bosses (with 07 bosses)
Wilderness bosses
Boss instancing
Full barrows
Godwars
Balanced combat
Account modes
Custom npc drops
Automatic voting
Good following (combat/non combat)
No dupes
Friendly community

fdG3U75.png763×569

2J6RjkD.png765×569

kqqOT9d.png762×571

hCfB47h.png762×504

egkxANp.png759×502

eh5I1Cj.png757×505

49qPRmn.png761×570

HLfh10w.png760×568

eIH7GjX.png761×566

buz46Dg.png759×564

g8RMw5P.png759×567

quE6Phx.png761×567

PXRr6wQ.png761×571





[B][I]Reworked Combat
Reworked Pvm Drops / Caskets
Fixed and tweaked alot of codes
Warning sign when dropping GP since it dissapears
Combat timer.
Items that teleports you too different bosses.
Gwd, Barrows, KQ, Corporal Beast venanetis, a wider range of pvming in general with sorted drops.
Prayer fixed
Special bar fixed
Base Fishing / Herblore added.
Restore pray/health glitch patched (this would result in negative donor points and players could always get pray/health)
Changed stores accordingly.
Trivia

  • More to come.[/I][/B]

[spoiler=Credits:]
Credits to roy and his team.
[/spoiler]
[/CENTER]
